description: Allows you to set a new key and value for the given Object.
label: Add new Key-Value to Object

options.name: object
options.label: object
options.info: Select an Object that should receive the new key value.

options.name: key
options.label: key
options.info: The Key under which to store the value.

options.name: value
options.label: value
options.info: The value the Key should get.
